name: Pixaw Puzzle
description:
Use blocks and complete pictures!
Place pieces with various colors and complete pixels.
Great game for breaktime or on the subway or bus
Capacity under 10MB can give you a long time fun.

Fresh accomplishment will be given when you put blocks on a right place one by one and complete stage

- Pixel + Jigsaw = Pixaw, Jigsaw puzzle with pixels
- Simple and familiar blocks
- Various style of pixels
- Stimulating brain with small stress
Have an exciting relax with Pixaw Puzzle!
